speaker: Slag Heap
lines: You step out to the slag heap behind the shop.
You see blue glass nodules in the ash.
You spot bent nails and broken rivets half-buried.
A bucket holds rainwater reflecting the sky.
You notice a strip of runed steel in the debris.
A lizard warms itself on an old rivet.
Loose slag shifts under your boots.
You mind your handsâ€”some edges are still sharp.

give_item.name: Slag Mantle
give_item.description: A cloak pinned with cooled mistakes

choices.text: Pocket the runed strip for later.
